title: Goff goes nuts, NFL Week 4 picks against the spread, betting guide (Football 09/28)
description:
Loaded show for Friday as Will Brinson is joined first by Jared Dubin to break down an incredible Thursday night matchup between the Rams and Vikings that featured Jared Goff and the L.A. offense GOING OFF. Then Nick Kostos stops by for a real life Pick Six segment, where the guys identify their best bets of the weekend and players/teams/sides they will be backing. Finally, Pete Prisco and R.J. White join Will to give their picks for every single game against the spread.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Jared Dubin joins the show to break down the Vikings-Rams shootout, Nick Kostos joins to give best bets of the weekend, Pete Prisco & R.J. White join to give their picks against the spread.
